When Remus went into the CR chamber, his spark already started to be
renerg=
ized. The huge amount of energy used by his hidden side of his
spark to giv=
e him greater abilities was too much for Remus. Being able
to refilled hims=
elf with energy was solving a big part of the problem.
The fact that he has=
n't been ripped from to matrix (a part of his
spark was "sleeping") had gav=
e him the small level of cousisness given
in the CR chamber. But who could =
tell what damaged had been done...
